s_synopsis: July 14, 2520 AD. The human race was annihilated by the light emitted by the "stone-like object" excavated from the stratum before Christ. Only four crew members belonging to the space cruiser "TETRA" and one robonoid survived in satellite orbit. A year later. The supplies on board are depleted. TETRA is forced to re-enter the atmosphere and begin the fight for human survival.
